markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />Interact ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157))    **Effect** You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the _fanged_ weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a [lizardfolk](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=15) would turn into a lizard, a [kitsune](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=38) into a fox, a [deer instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=1) [barbarian](/Classes.aspx?ID=2) into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the _fanged_ weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the _fanged_ weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the [two-hand](/Traits.aspx?ID=198) trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the _fanged_ weapon (whether or not of your own volition).
name: Interact (magical, polymorph, transmutation)
